products.categories: Condiments, Sauces, Pasta sauces, Tomato sauces, Tomato sauces with basil, Groceries
products.facts: ["Made with vine-ripened tomatoes for optimal flavor.","Uses high-quality, non-GMO ingredients.","Packaged in recyclable glass jars to reduce environmental impact.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors, ensuring a natural product."]

products.name: Biscuits blueberry
products.categories: Snacks, Breakfasts, Sweet snacks, Biscuits and cakes, Biscuits, Dry biscuits, Breakfast biscuit
products.facts: ["Made with fresh blueberries for natural sweetness and flavor.","Typically uses whole grain flour for added nutrition and fiber.","Blueberry bushes support local ecosystems by providing food for wildlife.","Quality biscuits often contain no artificial preservatives or colors."]

products.categories: Snacks, Salty snacks, Sweet snacks, Appetizers, Biscuits and cakes, Biscuits, Crackers
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality wheat flour and other natural ingredients.","Packaged in a convenient, resealable stack to maintain freshness and reduce waste.","Nabisco is committed to sustainable sourcing practices for their ingredients.","Contains no artificial flavors or colors, ensuring a quality snacking experience."]

products.name: Fig Bar Blueberry
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Snacks, Sweet snacks, Bars, Cereal bars
products.facts: ["Made with real blueberries for natural flavor.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Made with whole grains for added nutritional benefits."]

products.name: Coca-Cola zero sugar
products.categories: Beverages, Carbonated drinks, Artificially sweetened beverages, Sodas, Diet beverages, Colas, Diet sodas, Diet cola soft drink
products.facts: ["Coca-Cola Zero Sugar is packaged in recyclable PET plastic bottles.","The production of Coca-Cola Zero Sugar aims to reduce water usage and improve water efficiency in manufacturing plants.","Coca-Cola Zero Sugar contains no sugar or calories, making it a popular choice for those seeking healthier beverage options.","The company has committed to using 50% recycled material in its plastic bottles by 2030."]

products.name: Nestle coffee-mate coffee creamer canister
products.facts: ["The canister is made from recyclable plastic materials.","Coffee-mate is committed to reducing its carbon footprint through sustainable sourcing practices.","The product is lactose-free and suitable for those with dietary restrictions.","Nestle has initiatives in place to ensure responsible water use in its production processes."]

products.name: Monster Energy
products.categories: Beverages, Carbonated drinks, Artificially sweetened beverages, Sodas, Energy drinks, Sweetened beverages
products.facts: ["Monster Energy drinks are packaged in aluminum cans, which are recyclable and have a lower environmental impact compared to plastic.","The company focuses on using high-quality ingredients, including natural flavors and caffeine sourced from coffee beans.","Monster Energy has made efforts to reduce its carbon footprint by implementing energy-efficient practices in its production facilities.","The brand supports various ecological initiatives, including sponsorship of events that promote environmental awareness and sustainability."]

products.name: Lentil Bean Crisps Tomato Basil
products.facts: ["Made from lentil flour, which is a high-protein and gluten-free ingredient.","Contains no artificial flavors or preservatives, ensuring a more natural snack option.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting eco-friendly practices.","Lentils are a sustainable crop that require less water and fertilizer compared to traditional grains."]

products.name: Nature's own whole grain bread -oz
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads, White breads, Wheat breads, Wholemeal breads
products.facts: ["Made with whole grain flour for added fiber and nutrients.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors, promoting natural ingredients.","Sourced from sustainable farming practices to support ecological balance.","Rich in essential vitamins and minerals, enhancing overall quality and health benefits."]

products.name: Squeeze sour cream
products.categories: Dairies, Fermented foods, Fermented milk products, Creams, Fermented creams, Sour creams
products.facts: ["Squeeze sour cream is typically packaged in a convenient squeeze bottle made from recyclable plastic.","The production of squeeze sour cream often utilizes dairy sourced from local farms, promoting regional agriculture.","Many brands of squeeze sour cream strive for quality by using natural ingredients and avoiding artificial preservatives.","Squeeze sour cream containers are designed for minimal waste, allowing consumers to use every last drop without mess."]
